basic.description: Introduction to historical research and analysis of narrative and other films. Examines works, from a range of periods and settings, and the conditions that shaped their production, circulation and reception.
basic.subject: FILM
basic.title: Historical Inquiry

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite  (A grade of B- in FILM 110) or (a GPA of 2.60 in FILM 104 and FILM 106) or (a GPA of 2.60 in BISC100 and FILM104) and (reg. in a FILM Plan, STSC or the Computer-Film (COFI) Specialization Plan).
